elements.text: 期刊投稿比喻(journal versus submission)：巢 (nest) V.S. 蛋(egg)
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: The criteria of a good paper
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: What kinds of papers will be rejected before review??
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: How does the Editor assign each paper for external review?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: By the suggestion proposed by the reviewers who decline to review
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: Reviewer Form (International Journal of Science and Mathematics Education)   1/2
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: Relevance (e.g., Does the topic of the paper have significance for the readers of IJSME? Is the research question clearly identified? Does the study establish a relationship between the study and previous research? Is the guiding theoretical framework explained and justified?).
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: Methodology (e.g., Does the study provide and justify a link between the problem and the study design? Are the context of the study and the selection of participants adequately described? Does the study demonstrate that the procedures and methods of analyses are appropriate for the type of research being conducted?)
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: Reviewer Form (International Journal of Science and Mathematics Education) 2/2
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: Results and Findings (e.g., Does the study report adequate data to support its findings? Are the assertions supported by the data? Are the interpretations valid? Does the paper present information and ideas in a clearly organized way? Are the arguments made by the paper logically consistent?)
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: Significance (e.g., Do the findings or the arguments of the paper add new knowledge to existing literature?)
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 1. does the paper discuss or employ computers in education?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 2. is the abstract a concise account of the work and conclusions?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 3. is the introduction a satisfactory background to the work?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 4. are any technical methods adequately described and analysed?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 5. are the results adequately described and analysed?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 6. are the conclusions supported by the data?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 7. have alternative interpretations of the data been considered?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 8. is the arrangement of material satisfactory?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 9. can parts of the paper be presented more concisely?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 論文審查表(International Journal of Science Education)
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 1. Importance to science education in the context in which the study was conducted.
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 3. Data collection procedures: design, sampling, instruments.
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 6. Strength of argumentation: clarity of concepts, internal logic, and organization.
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 7. Interpretation, presentation, and discussion of findings.
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: So, what are the most important criteria?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: Which part is the most difficult? What part is relatively easier?
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 當你身為一位作者，在撰寫文章時…
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 文章格式要符合期刊要求
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 多引用想要投的期刊之前所刊登的文章
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 文章段落要做適當的切割
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 文章內容敘述清楚(logic, consistency, clarity)
elements.label: paragraph

elements.text: 投稿前先自己模擬審查結果
elements.label: paragraph
